Name: Dear Ashely
About the game: Introduction Jo is an extremely talented designer, who works for a company run by Mr. Charles all the year round. His works are also loved by people in the city. However, after a period of anxiousness and fretfulness, he finds that the inspiration of his creation is gradually fading. Should he take some time off, leave the city for a while, or see a therapist? Perhaps it will happen more than Joe expects, that will open up a huge conspiracy planned in the past. “Dear Ashely” will show you a fantastic personal growth journey through the memory of the past. An ordinary dream “Even if abandoned by the whole world, at least I have you.” A huge conspiracy “ No matter how much time and cost I will spend, I'll wake you up.” Feature A game with very simple mode of operation. Rich game plots that are the game player following Jo to explore the past. Having different styles of maps for players to play. A horrible, premeditated conspiracy will be found. The normal flow of the game is about an hour and a half, including five different-meaning endings.
